name: FE2Desktop DEMO
description:
This version of FE2Desktop is not a full release, but instead a demo for feedback. If you have any feedback about the game, email me at contactnofacestudios@gmail.com or let me know via my Twitter DM's.

The only map available at this moment is Lost Woods.

This Demo will be available from 1st June - 14 June.

FE2Desktop is expected to release Early-June.
